problem_names:
theorem (in endoNT) id_restrict_natural:
  "(\<lambda>A\<in>Ob. Id A) : (id_func AA) \<Rightarrow> (id_func AA) in Func(AA,AA)"
translations:
theorem (in endoNT) id_restrict_natural:
  "(\<lambda>A\<in>Ob. Id A) : (id_func AA) \<Rightarrow> (id_func AA) in Func(AA,AA)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. restrict (category.id AA)
     (Ob) : id_func AA \<Rightarrow> id_func AA in Func (AA , AA )

proof (intro natural_transformation.intro natural_transformation_axioms.intro 
    two_cats.intro ballI)

proof (state)
goal (8 subgoals):
 1. category AA
 2. category AA
 3. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 4. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 5. restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) \<in> Ob \<rightarrow> Ar
 6. restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) \<in> extensional (Ob)
 7. \<And>A.
       A \<in> Ob \<Longrightarrow>
       restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A
       \<in> Hom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
                  A id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A
 8. \<And>A B f.
       \<lbrakk>A \<in> Ob; B \<in> Ob; f \<in> Hom A B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<bullet>
                         restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A =
                         restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) B \<bullet>
                         id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
show "(\<lambda>A\<in>Ob. Id A) : Ob \<rightarrow> Ar"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) \<in> Ob \<rightarrow> Ar
by (rule funcsetI) auto

proof (state)
this:
  restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) \<in> Ob \<rightarrow> Ar

goal (7 subgoals):
 1. category AA
 2. category AA
 3. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 4. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 5. restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) \<in> extensional (Ob)
 6. \<And>A.
       A \<in> Ob \<Longrightarrow>
       restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A
       \<in> Hom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
                  A id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A
 7. \<And>A B f.
       \<lbrakk>A \<in> Ob; B \<in> Ob; f \<in> Hom A B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<bullet>
                         restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A =
                         restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) B \<bullet>
                         id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
show "(\<lambda>A\<in>Ob. Id A) \<in> extensional (Ob)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) \<in> extensional (Ob)
by (rule restrict_extensional)

proof (state)
this:
  restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) \<in> extensional (Ob)

goal (6 subgoals):
 1. category AA
 2. category AA
 3. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 4. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 5. \<And>A.
       A \<in> Ob \<Longrightarrow>
       restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A
       \<in> Hom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
                  A id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A
 6. \<And>A B f.
       \<lbrakk>A \<in> Ob; B \<in> Ob; f \<in> Hom A B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<bullet>
                         restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A =
                         restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) B \<bullet>
                         id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
fix A

proof (state)
goal (6 subgoals):
 1. category AA
 2. category AA
 3. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 4. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 5. \<And>A.
       A \<in> Ob \<Longrightarrow>
       restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A
       \<in> Hom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
                  A id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A
 6. \<And>A B f.
       \<lbrakk>A \<in> Ob; B \<in> Ob; f \<in> Hom A B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<bullet>
                         restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A =
                         restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) B \<bullet>
                         id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
assume A: "A \<in> Ob"

proof (state)
this:
  A \<in> Ob

goal (6 subgoals):
 1. category AA
 2. category AA
 3. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 4. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 5. \<And>A.
       A \<in> Ob \<Longrightarrow>
       restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A
       \<in> Hom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
                  A id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A
 6. \<And>A B f.
       \<lbrakk>A \<in> Ob; B \<in> Ob; f \<in> Hom A B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<bullet>
                         restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A =
                         restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) B \<bullet>
                         id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
hence "Id A \<in> Hom A A"

proof (prove)
using this:
  A \<in> Ob

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Id A \<in> Hom A A

proof (state)
this:
  Id A \<in> Hom A A

goal (6 subgoals):
 1. category AA
 2. category AA
 3. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 4. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 5. \<And>A.
       A \<in> Ob \<Longrightarrow>
       restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A
       \<in> Hom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
                  A id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A
 6. \<And>A B f.
       \<lbrakk>A \<in> Ob; B \<in> Ob; f \<in> Hom A B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<bullet>
                         restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A =
                         restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) B \<bullet>
                         id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
thus "(\<lambda>X\<in>Ob. Id X) A \<in> Hom ((id_func AA)\<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A)  ((id_func AA)\<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  Id A \<in> Hom A A

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A
    \<in> Hom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
               A id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A
using A

proof (prove)
using this:
  Id A \<in> Hom A A
  A \<in> Ob

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A
    \<in> Hom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
               A id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A
by (simp add: id_func_def)

proof (state)
this:
  restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A
  \<in> Hom id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub>
             A id_func AA \<^bsub>\<o>\<^esub> A

goal (5 subgoals):
 1. category AA
 2. category AA
 3. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 4. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 5. \<And>A B f.
       \<lbrakk>A \<in> Ob; B \<in> Ob; f \<in> Hom A B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<bullet>
                         restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A =
                         restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) B \<bullet>
                         id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
fix B and f

proof (state)
goal (5 subgoals):
 1. category AA
 2. category AA
 3. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 4. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 5. \<And>A B f.
       \<lbrakk>A \<in> Ob; B \<in> Ob; f \<in> Hom A B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<bullet>
                         restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A =
                         restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) B \<bullet>
                         id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f

assume B: "B \<in> Ob" 
    and "f \<in> Hom A B"

proof (state)
this:
  B \<in> Ob
  f \<in> Hom A B

goal (5 subgoals):
 1. category AA
 2. category AA
 3. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 4. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 5. \<And>A B f.
       \<lbrakk>A \<in> Ob; B \<in> Ob; f \<in> Hom A B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<bullet>
                         restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A =
                         restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) B \<bullet>
                         id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
hence "f \<in> Ar" and "A = Dom f" and "B = Cod f" and "Dom f \<in> Ob" and "Cod f \<in> Ob"

proof (prove)
using this:
  B \<in> Ob
  f \<in> Hom A B

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (f \<in> Ar &&& A = Dom f) &&&
    B = Cod f &&& Dom f \<in> Ob &&& Cod f \<in> Ob
using A

proof (prove)
using this:
  B \<in> Ob
  f \<in> Hom A B
  A \<in> Ob

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (f \<in> Ar &&& A = Dom f) &&&
    B = Cod f &&& Dom f \<in> Ob &&& Cod f \<in> Ob
by (simp_all add: hom_def)

proof (state)
this:
  f \<in> Ar
  A = Dom f
  B = Cod f
  Dom f \<in> Ob
  Cod f \<in> Ob

goal (5 subgoals):
 1. category AA
 2. category AA
 3. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 4. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 5. \<And>A B f.
       \<lbrakk>A \<in> Ob; B \<in> Ob; f \<in> Hom A B\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<bullet>
                         restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A =
                         restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) B \<bullet>
                         id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f

thus "(id_func AA)\<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<bullet> (\<lambda>A\<in>Ob. Id A) A
      = (\<lambda>A\<in>Ob. Id A) B \<bullet> (id_func AA)\<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f"

proof (prove)
using this:
  f \<in> Ar
  A = Dom f
  B = Cod f
  Dom f \<in> Ob
  Cod f \<in> Ob

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<bullet>
    restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A =
    restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) B \<bullet>
    id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f
by (simp add:  id_func_def)

proof (state)
this:
  id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f \<bullet>
  restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) A =
  restrict (category.id AA) (Ob) B \<bullet>
  id_func AA \<^bsub>\<a>\<^esub> f

goal (4 subgoals):
 1. category AA
 2. category AA
 3. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
 4. Functor id_func AA : AA \<longrightarrow> AA
qed (auto intro: id_func_functor, unfold_locales, unfold_locales)
end
